description:
A full-featured Swiss Army Knife for your brain.

The full-featured mind mapping and brainstorming app. Like a Swiss Army Knife, Xmind offers a complete toolset for thinking and creativity.
Important Updates
1. Gantt Chart - Plan with timelines. Drag bars to update progress and link tasks to create dependencies.
2. AI-Generated Mind Maps - Automatically turn any text, links, or documents into mind maps, or break them into tasks and to-dos.
3. Better Markdown Parsing - More reliable import and export with improved handling of tables, text styles, lists, and more.
Improvements
1. Task now support adding assignees and dependencies.
2. Task date formats automatically adapt to the app language.
3. Optimized date selection interaction for tasks.
4. Supported exporting tasks to CSV and Calendar (ICS) formats.
5. Exported branch now supports more formats.
6. Supported automatic parsing when pasting Markdown text.
7. Fixed an issue where collaborative files couldnâ€™t filter tasks.
8. Fixed an issue where exporting specific files to Word failed.
9. Fixed other known issues.
